about_the_game:
"Bureau of Contacts: Mansion" is a limited free version of the "Bureau of Contacts" full game, in which you can try the game loop of a full-fledged game based on one of its locations - an old mansion haunted by a ghost.

As an agent of the Bureau, you will have to:

RESEARCH

Use the basic toolkit to search for clues and identify the mansion's ghost.

COLLECT DOSSIERS

Interact with the ghost in voice or by chat to obtain its personal data necessary for the exorcism ritual.

EXORCISE

Follow the instructions in the Journal and correctly perform the exorcism procedure to fully complete your mission.

SURVIVE

Observe and use the features of the ghosts to stay alive as long as possible and have time to do as much as possible for your Bureau.

GO TO THE NEXT LEVEL

Think you're ready to go to the next level?
"Bureau of Contacts" - more locations, tools and ghosts, co-op mode, and generative AI built into enemies that makes the game even more realistic and unpredictable.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a horror game. It contains elements of fear, tension, fantasy violence and horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Explore an old mansion full of paranormal dangers alone. Find clues, identify ghosts, collect their dossiers and exorcise them.
